skins.selfIntroduction: I am a member of the Royal Navy's Attacker-class escort carriers. Although I served in the Royal Navy, I was originally born in the Eagle Union and even stayed in the Dragon Empery for some time. I really dislike submarines, but I should be fine as long as we deal with them carefully~
skins.acquisition: Greetings, Commander. Escort carrier Chaser, reporting for duty. Rumour has it that the tea and refreshments prepared here are simply delicious. Of course, I look forward to meeting friends here who share my refined taste, hehe~
skins.login: G'day, Commander. For beauty and health, start your morning with a cuppa~!
skins.details: Commander, adding milk to your black tea is a fine way of enjoying it as well~ If you get a chance, be sure to give it a try.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Launching and landing carrier-based planes is a bit of a sensitive topic. You'll end up in hot water if you're not careful.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, have you seen an aurora before? The dazzling, ever shifting bands of light illuminating the night sky... I'd really like you to see for yourself.
skins.secretaryIdle3: I'm really worried about the escort destroyers. As soon as they see submarines, they immediate charge forward. Please remind them to stay in escort formation.
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, my aircraft are in ace condition, ready to deploy at any time!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: This is no way to treat a lady~

skins.ENClientName: The Way of the Dragon Empery
skins.shipDescription: Does this dress from the Dragon Empery not suit me well? Though I was born in the Eagle Union and raised by the Royal Navy, my time in the Dragon Empery also left a deep impression upon me. Why don't we have a chat about their profound culture and tea? Hehe~
skins.acquisition: Does this dress from the Dragon Empery not suit me well? Though I was born in the Eagle Union and raised by the Royal Navy, my time in the Dragon Empery also left a deep impression upon me. Why don't we have a chat about their profound culture and tea? Hehe~
skins.login: Hm? Commander, you're back~ Is there a story you'd like to hear from me today?
skins.details: After spending some time in the Empery, I started to realise that, in addition to black tea, I sometimes wanted to enjoy the fragrance of green tea as well.
skins.secretaryIdle1: The Dragon Empery's traditional dances seem difficult to learn... Eh, you'd like to learn them with me? In that case, we should be able to learn them in no time~
skins.secretaryIdle2: Eh, fireworks display? Um, I think I'll pass... I'm... not good around fire.
skins.secretaryIdle3: (yawns) ... Ahh, I stayed up too late last night exchanging stories with the Empery girls, so I'm really sleepy...
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, do you like my qipao? Don't you think blonde hair matches the aesthetic of the dress quite well? Ehehe~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Oh dear... Commander, flirting is fine but please don't go overboard~

skins.shipDescription: Heck yeah! Another achievement down! ...Huh? Good day, Commander. Is there something wrong with my appearance? Hehe, I'm from the Eagle Union after all, of course I'd know a thing or two about entertainment~?
skins.acquisition: Heck yeah! Another achievement down! ...Huh? Good day, Commander. Is there something wrong with my appearance? Hehe, I'm from the Eagle Union after all, of course I'd know a thing or two about entertainment~?
skins.login: C'mon, Commander! Which stage are we gonna clear today?
skins.details: Our work takes us to the far corners of the world. Keeping a game console on hand to stave off boredom is a good idea, isn't it?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Long Island, down to host another raid next time? I want to get some new equipment~?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Bogue's pitches are way too overpowered... No matter how hard I try, I can only hit two or three out of ten...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Listen to this, Commander! I learned how to cook from Mullany! ...Eh, I learned the wrong thing...?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Jeez... games aren't enough for you?
